amendment.description: Amendment eliminates Department of Energy funding of $126.5 million for the Partnership for a Next Generation of Vehicles program and applies $86 million to debt reduction and $40 million to Payment in Lieu of Taxes, Land and Water Conservation, and Forest Service and National Park Service maintenance programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 30 printed in the Congressional Record to provide $40 million ($10 million to each program) to the PILT, the Land and Water Conservation Fund, State-side Grant Program, and National Forest and Park Service maintenance accounts while eliminating $126.5 million for the Partnership for a New Generation of Vehicles program and thus their portion of the DoE's buddget $40 million. The remaining $86.5 million will be transferred to the general fund of the Treasury.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sununu amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 214 - 211 (Roll no. 274).
